meanings.definition: Not able to be listened to or heard with pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The screeching sound was unlistenable to my ears.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise was unlistenable and gave me a headache.
meanings.sent3: The unlistenable music made everyone cover their ears in pain.
meanings.sent4: The unlistenable noise was like nails on a chalkboard.
meanings.sent5: The unlistenable cacophony filled the room with discomfort.

meanings.definition: Impossible to listen to or endure.
meanings.sent1: The unlistenable lecture seemed to never end.
meanings.sent2: The unlistenable noise from the construction site was unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The unlistenable chatter of the monkeys made the zoo visitors laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unlistenable silence in the room was deafening.
meanings.sent5: The unlistenable screeching of the microphone made the audience cringe.
